info.title: About Stability
info.description: Stability is more important than perfection in aquariums. Large, rapid parameter swings can stress livestock more than slightly out-of-range values. This plan limits each change and spaces them apart for safety.

info.title: How it works
info.description: Water changes dilute tank water with fresh replacement water. The calculator uses the dilution formula to predict how each parameter shifts.
